1352322222222222222222222222222221222.content:
The first and last thing you remember is that you were screaming at the top of your lungs. You don't even remember why. But by the time you realized you were screaming, you had stopped to catch your breath. And that's when you realized just how big everything seemed around you. And pink. Also a lot of pink. But all the stuff around you looked like giant chairs, giant beds, giant pictures and desks, lot of loose makeup and dresses lying around.

"I didn't...I couldn't...could I...?"

You didn't even want to consider the possibility of you being shrunk, but that looked more and more likely as you saw a large shadow coming in through the door, which only looked more terrifying from the moonlight coming through the window. And as it grew, you started seeing a giant human coming your way...a young girl with long blonde hair and a tiara in a pink dress singing loudly (and badly).

"Oh man oh man oh man oh man, this can't be happening..."

The girl, Lola Loud, looked over and saw the tiny little person trying to hide behind her trash can. She grinned her wide, evil smile as she recognized you.

"Oh goody!" Lola exclaimed, "Lisa's shrink machine actually worked! Now I have a plaything all to myself!"

"What?" you cried out, "I'm not anyone's plaything! I don't even know who you are!"

"Alrighty then," Lola said, towering over you, "I'm Lola Loud...your NEW QUEEN!"

135232222222222222222222222222222222311.content:
You were just a young boy around 13 who just so happened to still like watching kids show cartoons despite being really good at sports and being among the popular crowd in school. Then one day while watching the Nick Jr. animated show-Little Bear on TV on a cloudy Saturday,you were bored stiff as there was nothing to do at all,with all your friends busy doing chores and when out of the blue the TV set became bright,very bright as a big bright light was erupting from it,causing you to fall out of your chair.

"Whoa what th-" You cried,surprised and bewildered,randomly pressing buttons on the remote to see what the problem was,but nothing at all happened,the darn thing wasn't working at all.

"Stupid remote! What could be the problem......HUH WHA-" YOU shouted as the bright light suddenly engulfed you and for a few seconds,you were blinded until all went black.


When you came to a few minutes later,you noticed everything in your living room or rather your parents' living room,was gone and for some reason,everything looked oddly enormous and completely animated!

"W-where the hell am I?" You wondered as you take a few curiously steps forward and quickly noticed you seemed to be in someone's room,but it looked so old-fashioned like out of the early 1900s or something and there were even old-fashioned clothes,drawers and toys in a toy chest in one corner of the room then you saw the massive bed at the center and after a hour length of climbing,you,exhausted saw the gigantic child sleeping in it with her little doll tuckered in her right hand,as the girl looked around 7 years old but you had no trouble knowing exactly who this was.

"Whoa what th- Is..Is that? I-it is! It's the little girl Emily from Little bear!" You choked out breathlessly.

At the moment,she was fast asleep in her hot pink, long-sleeved, floor-length nightgown with a blue bow, frilly white collar and cuffs and a pink headband as you couldn't help but think how incredibly adorable she really was,in her completely hand drawn cartoon format and as she snored softly,the whole bed shook like crazy and you had to latch onto the bottom of her night gown just to prevent from flying off and hitting the floor!

Then you decided to make literal contact with the massive 7 year old giantess but where do you start?
135232222222222222222222222222222222311.title: Sure!

choices: That massive drool puddle she's making
1352322222222222222222222222222222223111.content:
It was a long trek, but you managed to go across the soft plains of bed sheet and climb up to her pillow to try and reach the top of her head. And although to a normal sized person Emily's snoring was soft and calming, to someone the size of an ant, much like yourself, it was like the world's largest motorcycle revving up. But at least now you were at the top of her head, landing softly onto the top of her hair, feeling just how soft it was, the sweet smell of vanilla going through your nostrils.

"Hey! Hello!" you screamed.

You jumped up and down, hoping your own tiny little legs could spark a reaction by connecting with her head. But again, you were so small it barely even registered in her consciousness...or lack thereof, in this case. With the thunderous sounds of her snores riding throughout, and no clear indication of your current method working, you look to see anywhere else you can go to try and wake her up...
1352322222222222222222222222222222223111.title: At the top of her head!

choices: You pull/jump on her lips and/or teeth
1352322222222222222222222222222222223111.content:
It probably wasn't that big from a normal human's perspective, but to a tiny little ant like you, the massive drool stain on Emily's pillow looked quite large. Yet it was probably your shortcut to a soft landing and to trying to get Emily awake. Praying for the best but preparing for the worst, you jumped off of the safety of Emily's head, feeling loose strands of her hair brushing past you, and falling in style towards the drool puddle. You figured it'd be soft, but when you actually landed, you felt extreme moisture on both your hands and your feet when you landed in it.

"Eeeew," you said, "I wasn't expecting this much!"

It was true, looking all around you, you could see the dampness of Emily's drool soaking into her pillow. Not a dry spot could be seen from where you were. And when you looked behind you, you looked up and saw Emily's giant sleeping face. You felt her sweet, candy-scented breath blowing across you like a strong wind, and could see her big, luscious lips parted as she snored...and the waterfall of drool coming down her chin into the puddle. You also could see, from your size, just how much of her drool was caked onto her cheek during her deep slumber.

"Great," you said, starting to traverse across the soggy sheets, "I hope this works"
1352322222222222222222222222222222223111.title: That massive drool puddle she's making

But then a thought occurred in your head...maybe you didn't need to. Maybe she was ticklish...

"Well, I've got mountains of foot to work with," you said, "Maybe this can get her up?"

141111.content:
On a calm day in some unnamed city in the United States of America in the year of 1991 A.D., people went about their day-to-day lives. Children rode to school, adults to work, and cheap businesses were trying to sell their low-quality products to unsuspecting customers. However, the arrival of a ‘larger-than-life’ individual would promptly shatter by that livelihood.

A puff of purple smoke suddenly manifested in the middle of the city, swirling and rising ominously like a storm cloud. The daily traffic halted and dozens of civilians pointed and gawked at the unnatural phenomenon. The fog grew to encompass the space of a city block, blinding anyone unfortunate enough to be caught in it. Eventually, the opaque mist dissipated, but what took its place was equally, if not more, attention-grabbing.

“Wh-where am I?”

The question came from what took the place of the smoke. It was a giant eleven-year-old girl – fifty feet, to be specific – whose name was Hermione Jean Granger. Her brown eyes widened in shock as she was trying to process her new situation. Last time she checked, she was back at home in the United Kingdom of Great Britain, practicing a few spells before attending the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Apparently, she screwed up a couple spells, because now she was teleported to the other side of the pond and towered over the average human by almost tenfold. Thankfully, her clothes grew along with her, so this was slightly less embarrassing than it could have been. The prepubescent took a cautious left step forward in the narrow, crowded streets, taking care not to crush the frightened Muggle populace. As she walked, her feet formed print-shaped craters in the dark gray pavement and she could not stop herself from crushing a few cars.

“I hope the owners have insurance.” Hermione thought, wondering if any company of that nature would cover damages caused by giantesses.

The puny humans continued their frantic fleeing from the adolescent titaness, spouting insults like ‘Monster!’ and ‘Freak!’ and her. Hermione’s lips quivered and her face began to redden as she made an honest effort to assure the masses that she had no intentions to harm them, but they fell on deaf ears and hysteria only increased amongst the crowds. One of the scared denizens even suggested calling in the military, a sentiment shared by fellow chaotic huddles. Hermione was about to try to calm them down, but was interrupted by a monstrous growl that echoed throughout the city. The cute witch clutched her belly in pain, assaulted by a hunger that matched her new size. She shifted focus away from the screaming mob and on sating her nigh-crippling famished state, continuing her accidental rampage through the generic city, this time in search of sustenance. More property damage was caused on her way to her desired location: a closed McDonalds. Seeing no other way to gain access to the diabetic-inducing delicacies inside without essentially destroying the building anyway, Hermy simply opted to tear off the roof and sit it on the parking lot before stuffing her hands inside to grasp the feast of fast food. After scooping up several handfuls and shoveling them into her mouth, the entire restaurant was now barren.

The mega-sized magic user rubbed her now full tummy, smiling sweetly. However, eating all of that food had an unintended side effect. The literal tons of air that the Brunette Brit swallowed along with her meal mixed with the digesting nourishment and boiling stomach acid, forming a maelstrom of gas that made her belly growl once again. Said maelstrom also ascended through a valve at the top of the stomach, making a bulge in her esophagus that shoved aside her chest organs on its way out. Hermione clasped her right hand over her mouth to contain the explosion of gas, but it was too powerful to be held back, and the wave of foul oxygen shortly puffed out her cheeks before blowing away her hand and leaving her body.

“*BBBBBBUUUUUUUURRRRRRRPPPPP!*”{/i }

Hermione’s red lips quaked from the force of her beastly belch. It created a shockwave that collapsed and blew away the Golden Arch sign in front of the restaurant, as well as the restaurant itself and several other buildings. The exhaust of air shattered all of the windows in the entire city. Trees had their leaves blown off, car alarms went off, and most cars were turned over. Everyone within a one-mile radius went permanently deaf as his or her eardrums immediately ceased working and they tried covering their ears to block out the sound to no avail Even the very ground itself shook before the power of Hermione’s apocalyptic eructation, as her head was swinging uncontrollably from side to side and tremors led to spider web-shaped cracks in the road. The windstorm that shot out of her mouth flung dozens of people into the air. However, the worst aspect of the booming burp was the smell; a sickly jade haze drifted out of her maw, and people was puking their guts out, knocked unconscious, or outright killed when they inhaled it through her mouths or nostrils. The loud burp clocked in at ten seconds or more, and Hermione highly embarrassed slapped both her hands over her mouth when it ended.

“WHOOPS…! OHHH MY GOODNESS! I’M SO TERRIBLY SORRY ABOUT THAT! EXCUSE ME, EVERYBODY! I DIDN’T WANT TO LET THAT OUT, BUT I JUST COULDN’T KEEP IT DOWN!” The witch loudly apologized with a shocked expression while her face blushed crimson like a tomato in embarrassment.

Hermione surveyed the effects of her Burp-quake, but her reaction wasn’t as horrified as one would expect in fact it went from highly embarrassed to downright creepy,mischievous smile. She saw the bodies that littered the streets next to the rubble of once multi-storied structures, though she was appalled and horrified by the monstrous disaster she caused a now dark thought popped into her mind.

“Hmm, so just one burp did all of this. I wonder what other things I can do at this size.”

Something shuffled on the ground beneath her, pulling her out of her pondering. She looked down to see a man, barely eighteen years old, crawling out of the wreckage. He looked up to see a right hand come down on him and pull his heavily injured body off the ground. A lustful smile from a girl with long, bushy brown hair greeted the man.

“Hello cutie!” She opened up her palm slowly smiling innocently as the tiny teenager curled into a tiny ball

“Oh God, please don’t kill me!” He shouted.

“Don’t worry, I’m not going to hurt you.” The giant British witch whispered tenderly

The man stared in disbelief until Hermione pulled up the front of her black skirt and yanked out her panties. Then, she dropped him into said panties, trapping him next to her closed vagina. Hermione felt a wave of pleasure wash over her, and she decided to walk to a part of the city that was not destroyed her footsteps again causing mild tremors and leaving shoe shaped craters in the roads.

A few minutes later…

Hermione arrived at a point near the edge of the city to sit and play around with her new toy, near a relatively intact mall, and the presence of several tanks and helicopters met with her. Leading them was a general who gave the colossal witch a scornful scowl.

“Fire!” She ordered.

Her forces complied, launching a hail of missiles, bullets, bombs, and grenades at the fifty-foot soon-to-be schoolchild. Upon collision, Hermione was engulfed in a multitude of explosions. The general looked on at the results and smirked.

“Got you.”

However, that smirk faded when she saw the smoke clearing. The firepower had left not a pile of ash, but a giantess who was rendered to a simple T-Shirt and underwear. Fortunately, the man in her panties was unhurt.

“Wow, some of my clothes are tougher than I thought.” She mused. Then, she gazed down at the antagonistic army and smirked. “Now, it’s my turn.”

Hermione clapped her hands together, creating a sonic boom that knocked a trio of helicopters out of the sky. Thankfully, the pilots ejected themselves before the downed choppers hit the ground. A tank was the next target, as Hermione ran and kicked it into the air like a soccer ball. She was about to repeat the maneuver with another tank but the brunette accidentally tripped on it, and fell butt-first onto the mall. Though people filled the mall, no one was hurt for some reason. On the other hand, an unlucky soul(who looked a little older than the other boy)ended up stuck in her butt somehow. Another feeling of euphoria overtook Hermione, which was even better than having the man in the front of her underwear. Therefore, she released that person from the front and pulled out the one in her booty, bringing him up to her face.

“What are you going to do to me?” The second man asked in fear.

A giggle answered him and he received repeated kisses from her puckered cherry lips. He tried to struggle and fight against her but even without a magic wand Hermione was relentless and her grip like the incredibly strong jaws of a snapping turtle After the fifth smooch, Hermione changed tactics and chose to cuddle him against her left cheek, smothering him in her somewhat pasty skin. A few minutes passed before that stopped too and she initiated her next method of torment.

“Coochie Coochie Coo!” She said as she playfully tickle-tortured him stroking his stomach with her index finger.

Despite the dire situation, he could not help but laugh and wiggle in response to this. “Please stop! Hehehe… I can’t take it anymore! Hahaha!” He begged.

Hermione shook her head horizontally. “Tickle, tickle, tickle!” She taunted as she continued.

Meanwhile, the military was pondering how they were going to defeat this massive ‘little witch’.

“I’m open to suggestions.” The general admitted.

One of the soldiers gave an option…

1411111.content:
"So, let me get this straight. You want us to power her up by feeding her so she burps and damages the city even more?" The general asked, getting a little upset. The soldier shook his head. His idea had worked on creatures at home, like stray cats or bunnies, so why wouldn't it work on a little girl?

"Sir, if we could lead her away, we get hit her with stronger bombs and get her away from the citizens, it may be the only way to defeat her. Can't we at least attempt it?" The soldier said, standing up straight. The general thought about it for a minute. The other soldiers stayed quiet. Though they didn't like the idea, they silently agreed that it might be the only way. However, they needed the general's permission on it.

"Very well, we'll give it a shot." The general said. He spoke into his walkie talkie and told them to bring food, a LOT of it. While they waited, they kept an eye on Hermione, who was still having fun with the little man she was holding onto.

She thought the man was really cute, and didn't feel like letting him go so soon after getting him. She decided to save him for later, so she opened her panties and dropped him in with the other male. She closed her panties up and patted it. She could feel both of them squirming in there, and it felt amazing. She turned towards the soldiers. A couple took a step back when their eyes met.
"So, which one of you cute men is next? Are there any volunteers? If you volunteer, I might be kind to you. I might even have something 'special' planned." She said, winking.

"No! The food isn't here yet!" The general said, gritting his teeth. One of the younger soldiers piped up, saying they could volunteer and distract her. "Are you sure?" The general asked, looking at him. The soldier nodded and ran towards Hermione.

"I volunteer, oh beautiful queen!" The soldier yelled. Hermione took a giant step forward and picked him up. He was raised up to her face. Her breath smelled nice and warm.

"Very good little man, because you volunteered, I'll give you special treatment." She said and placed him in her mouth to hold. She then took her shirt and bra off. She dropped them to the ground and pulled the soldier out. She pushed him against her breast softly. "Go ahead and drink little man." She said. The soldier hesitated, then did as she said. As he sucked on her nipple, she moaned a little. She then pulled him away and kissed him. "I think I'll put you in another place where no one has ever been to." She opened her panties in the back and dropped him in. Hermione put her bra back on, just as she smelled something tasty.

She turned to see a helicopter holding a large bag full of food. She took a step forward and reached for it. The helicopter moved away, making her a little mad. She followed it out of town. She eventually couldn't take it anymore and jumped. She grabbed it and made it crash. The pilot got out and ran away, not that she cared at the moment. She only cared that she had tasty food. She started to gobble everything down. Almost immediately after she started, she gave a huge burp. Suddenly stronger missiles came down on her. They threw everything they had at her. They even threw a couple nukes at her. Once they smoke cleared, the army was eagerly waiting to see the results.

However, once things cleared up, they saw Hermione still eating, as if she never even noticed she was being attacked.
"You have got to be kidding me! Can nothing stop this beast?!" The general yelled. Unfortunatly, she should have kept quiet because as soon as he said that, Hermione stopped moving and turned around.

"What in Hogwarts did you just say? Did you just call me a beast?" Hermione said, quickly losing her temper. She gave a large burp, making everyone fall down. Hermione then stomped over and stepped on the general. He yelled with pain, however, she didn't care. Not after what he just called her. She picked him up and burped in his face. "Do you like that? You're the one who fed me, so consider this your 'reward'" she said, giggling.

14112.content:
You were having a very strange day, one minute you were sitting around at home playing video games and reading comic books and the next you were in the cold outside a castle, which was freaking huge. Deciding it at least had to be warmer in the castle you slipped in through the slightly open doors, immediately slipping into the shadow of a suit of armour when you see it's full of giants most of them kids around age 11 or 12 in black robes milling about.

Once things quiet down you take a moment to try come up with a plan of action: you knew you would need to get assistance from at least one of the giants, you knew you couldn't survive at this size by yourself, but you also knew trying to get help from them when grouped together will get you nothing but crushed, so needed to find a way to get the attention of one by themselves.

With the coast clear you decide to head for the steps, thinking it would be easier to find a single person where there was less traffic, heaving yourself up and over each step with some effort. By the time you reached the top you were panting, needing a break but glad you had done it. The happiness was short lived as you heard the thunderous noise of more of the giants coming, both their footfalls as well as their general chatter.

Hiding between the banisters of the staircase you were lucky the giants were apparently oblivious to anything that wasn't in front of them, or in your case anything below them. When everyone was gone you breathe a sigh of relief but then a enormous shadow appears over you.

'"Hello, what do we have here?"' you nearly jump when you hear someone speak, more so because you're pretty sure it's directed at you. Turning slowly you see a girl with thick, bushy, brown hair dressed in the black robes with a red trim and her arms full of heavy looking books,she's most definitely talking and looking right at you.

'"Um hi, I'm Henry. Sorry about this but who are you and where am I?'" you ask, trying not to be rude to the young giantess.

'"I'm Hermione Granger and this is Hogwarts, located in ... well somewhere in Scotland they weren't exactly specific'......." she answers and you just stare at her in shock

'"Scotland? But I was in Maine like an hour ago, I was also normal size an hour ago'" you say, mostly to yourself but apparently she heard you

'"Maine? That's in America isn't it? Wait! Oh my, you're... you're non magical aren't you?" she asks with a frown on her face

'"Non magical?'" You repeat arching a eyebrow "What do you mean by that?"

"Well Henry it means you're what we call a Muggle or nonmagical person this castle you're in is called Hogwarts, and it's a school for witches and wizards. I should have realised from your clothes you weren't a student but getting shrunk feels like a advanced spell or curse that wouldn't happen around here." she answers as she put down the books at her side and bent down to study you.

"Wait? Wizard,witches? You're....you can do magic? This is crazy...then what am I saying...... I don't care if you're from outer space! Can you help me? Mostly my size but probably my being here too?" you ask, pleading with fate this girl can help you

Hermione shrugs

"Well normally that would be a problem as we of magical nature aren't allowed to help people of nonmagical origins but I can...I will try. I first need to put my books away, then after lunch I have class and then a free period where I could go to the library and try find an answer to your problem alright?" she asks and you nod vigorously despite her sort of bossy like tone she seemed really friendly and trustworthy.


"Great, then lets go..." But she stops and looks embarrassed, while you most likely look confused.

"What's wrong Hermione?"

"Um it'd be quicker if you just came with me, can I pick you up?" she asks without looking at you.

"Yes anything to make things easier for us both." you answer and she smiles before picking you up, her fingers the size of tree trunks gently wrap around your waist before she places you on top of her books and continues to the common room, meanwhile you watch in awe at the magical odds and ends Hermione either ignores or is used to after a couple of years in a magical school.

When she reaches the stairs leading to the dorm she hesitates, then when she looks down you know she can see the question on your face

"The stairs are jinxed so boys can't enter the girl's dorm. Hopefully you'll be too small to be detected but I don't want to fall and accidentally crush you on the way down." she explains in a worried tone.

"This is probably the safest place for me, let's take the chance." you answer and your enthusiasm seems to pass on to her and Hermione straightened her spine and upper body and steps onto the stairs, making her way to her dorm without issues. Once there she drops the books on her bed and places you softly on a lone pillow and goes to grab the next ones she'll need, meanwhile you sit on her pillow where she left you.

"So what do we do now?" you ask curiously

"Well..." Hermione begins

What is her plan?

1) She plans to leave you here and come back at free period, thinking the less chances for people to see you the better
2) She thinks the best place for you to be safe is with her, so plans to keep you with her for the next few hours, be that in a pocket or on a part of her body is up to you/her.

As the massive 12 year old witch is staring at you with a blank expression: https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=htt... you suddenly wished this was all a crazy dream and that you would wake up safe and sound in your bed you tried pinching yourself but it didn't help this was indeed for real!

"Hermione I apologize for all the constant popping up but you surely understand it wasn't pleasant at all in your robes,plus I was merely curiously and I happen to be highly claustrophobic and....." But yo your utter surprise she cut you off with a small smile

"I thought you said you had a few more classes?" You curiously asked

"My next class doesn't start in another hour so for now I'm just resting normally I'd be down in the common room below studying since you're here I wanted to get to know you a bit better." The young witch explained.

"Huh? Excuse me?" You said raising your voice a bit

"Tell me a bit about yourself." She replied

"Oh okay well my name is Henry Davis Jr. I live in Maine,Fl in the U.S. I'm currently 12 years old my hobbies include well you probably wouldn't be interested in all this mindless...Er what was it you said before Muggle stuff?" You stopped mid-speech wondering how exactly you were supposed to explain ordinary stuff to a magical girl but she seemed totally interested.

"No you're not boring me keep going tell me a bit more about yourself like where do you go to school? And who are your friends?" She brought you closer to her billboard face

"Yeah school's not so bad except I'm horrible at math and science as for friends yeah I have a few and mostly we just go out and play baseball,ride bikes and stuff baseball is a sport where you....."

"I know what it is and bicycles as well." Hermione interrupted you calmly

"Yo...you're familiar with nonmagical things like baseball?" You ask taken back

"Yeah as a matter of fact both of my parents are nonmagical or as you would call them dentists people who fix teeth I grew up around Muggles-oh sorry I mean nonmagical people! I'm sorry Henry I don't mean to keep saying that it's not usual used to offense people of your status I'll just call you by your real name Henry if you don't mind but anyway yes I'm sort of familiar with your sport of baseball and a few other things as well alright you described a bit of yourself to me now it's my turn as you can tell I love reading books and studying all the time you'll hardly find me doing anything else on a daily basis so now that we know a bit about each other...." Hermione giggled

"Does this mean we can be friends?" You ask nervously as you told a little white lie earlier you weren't that great at making friends at your school but she nodded eagerly

"Yes! I have a feeling we'll be great friends Henry you seem to be a very nice person and I'd love to be your friend! But it's a half hour and I have a bit of studying to do....." As she stood up to place you back on the table

"Wait can I ask you something real quick first?" You had the question pop up in your mind and she paused and stared at you.

"Yes? Go ahead."

"You said this place Warthog was a magical school? For real? You're not joking this isn't a school for regular British children? I mean I watched television and..."

"First it's called Hogwarts and yes it is indeed a school of magic where young witches and wizards learn all about magic and the Wizarding World in general or the hidden society of magical people who remain hidden from the nonmagical popluation of London for centuries." She carefully explained

"Yeah anyway do you think you can show me a bit of this magic?" You asked eagerly

"What?" Hermione arched a eyebrow "Show you a bit of magic?" As she took out a stick from her robes pointing it at you but then decided against it "No,no I shouldn't!" She shook her head

"Bu...but why not?" You asked confused as she sat back down on the bed facing you with a somber face.

"You remember what I told you before about witches and wizards hiding from the nonmagical popluation right? Well that's sort of the reason we're not allowed to use magic in front of Muggles unless it's a dire emergency or very important that's the number one rule degreed by the Ministry of Magic who makes all the laws here in the Wizarding World! So you see Henry as much as I'd like to show you I can't I could get into serious trouble,I could be expelled...."

"I understand okay bad idea! I apologize Hermione." You reply feeling a little disappointed

"Don't feel bad Henry I did say we can do a bit of magic in front of nonmagical people if it's a emergency and considering your current tiny state it actually is! But if I have some free time later in maybe I could spare to show you a tiny bit of magic but you must not be discovered and stick very close to me understand?" She gave you a stern look and you nodded

"Yes crystal clear Miss Hermione." You replied as she again stood up looking you over

"Alright well it's almost time for my next set of classes Henry I'd take you with me again but I'm terrified you may be discovered so just stay here on my dresser until I return oh and if anyone comes up here any other girl besides me jump into my bed and Stay Hidden please? I'd hate to find out if anything horrible happened to you!" As she bent down forward towards you with a sweet smile so you can see nothing but her massive pretty face "Alright?" She asked tenderly
"Y..yes I'll Hermione! You have nothing to worry about." You promised she beamed happily at you then departed towards the dorm room exit leading downstairs......

You're sleep was interrupted by what felt like a strong tremor, quickly you shot up and prepared to run for safety, before remembering where you were, the red panty clad ass helping to speed the process up in that regard. You couldn't see anything past Hermione's even for a twelve year old's sizable rear but you guessed it was quite late, especially given the brunette appeared to have forgotten you. Not wanting to be found and labelled a pervert because of an accident (such as she was stripping into her PJs in front of you) you reach out and pinch her in order to get her attention. Hermione jumps and you have to scrabble back to avoid being crushed.

Hermione wonders aloud before picking you up again and sitting you on her lap "I'm sorry Henry I guess I had a lot more on my mind than I thought if it pushed you out of it a bit....." she smiles and you know there was no bad intentions just a simple mistake.

"So did you grab the book?" You asked heatedly

Hermione shuffles
"Sort of, to tell the truth I'm only in my second year here at Hogwarts and unfortunately there are no spells specifically dedicated to shrinking, but I did find one on magical oddities, most of which are maladies, curses and ah specialised use spells." she blushes and you worry slightly "The word they use is fetish." she clarifies and you join her in blushing bright red.

Placing you back on the dresser she quickly reaches into her pack (which must be enchanted as it couldn't fit all the books she carries around) and pulls out a book with strange symbols all over it.

"Will this help me?" you ask hopefully

"Only one way to find out." Hermione answers, opening it to page 1 and beginning to leaf through it, you reading along from her lap.......

While unable to find a magical reason for your shrinkage, you did find a spell that could trandform you into an animal, make you muscular for 3 hours as well as transform someone into a pair of panties or a dildo, you can guess both you and Hermione had bright crimson cheeks if the speed at which she turned the page when she realised what they were reading was anything to go on.

"Well that was a very odd and humiliating spell! Honestly why would anyone want to transformed into a pair of girl's undergarments?" She said in disgust yet looked down at you with a small smile "But anyway let's continue shall we?"

Eventually Hermione found something that sounded like what happened to you, but there was a problem...

What was it?

"Why did you run away like that? You can't make it on your own out here! Not at that size! Tsk,Tsk....now I'll have to really punish you for disobeying me but how.....hmmmmmm..." As you were literally shivering both from the 30 below zero weather and from pure fear in general as she kept thinking and thinking about whether she should punish you.




"Ohhh I can't do it,I'm not that kind of person who goes around punishing little creatures just for disobeying me! But you could have stayed put. I can help keep you warm! Alright? I promise nothing bad will happen to you! And I do forgive you...." As Lucy tenderly hugged you against her chest to keep you warm and as she slowly walked back towards the wardrobe,she continued playing and hugging you while she rubbed you with her right chubby cheek to keep you from freezing and laughed sweetly while you couldn't do anything. Hehehehe...You're sooo adorable! You can stay with me in my room in the mansion,my name is Lucy,Lucy Pevensie by the way,I'm sorry I didn't introduce myself eariler." As she gave you a sweet smile.



Once back in her room,Lucy calmly dropped you on her dresser,staring at you with the usual childlike curiosity.

"So how did you get that way little one?" She asked concerned as you struggled to reply,busy looking around at the massive large bedroom which looked like it came right out of the 1940s!

"I-I don't know honest! I just woke up like this and suddenly surrounded by nothing but snow and frost in that strange icy place!" As she stared calmly at you before replying.

"Well I do believe you're telling the truth and past events aside,I assure you will be safe alright?" She said,smiling sweetly at you. "But here,let me get you something to sleep in and some food as you must be starving by now."



As the days passed,you found Lucy,the youngest of the recently orphan siblings who lived here to be incredibly nice and kind-hearted as she,true to her word,fed and even bathe you,letting you sleep on a tiny cot but still,she still resorted back to that highly playful person as when you first encountered her from time to time.

"Let's have a little bit of fun together! Hehehe .....Now don't be scared,I'll only be playing with you alright?As Lucy hugged you tenderly against her chest and placed you at her feet,letting you see how enormous they were compared to your own tiny height!

"Hehehe are they large enough for you?" She sweetly teased,wiggling her largest toe in front of you.

But mostly,Lucy remained her very sweet,innocent self as she had to constantly hide you from her other siblings as she stated she didn't know how any of them might react upon seeing such a tiny person in their midst.




But still,she would still play a little too rough with you. "Hahahaha it's great to have you as my new little friend ohh you're just sooo cute..no one ever pays any attention to me at all. But luckily,I have you here to keep me company and ohhh I just have to..... hehehe!" As much to your utter surprise,the titanic little girl simply puckered up her lips,leaned forward and started repeatedly kissing you!

"Ahhhh..STOP! STOP IT!!" You screamed as she had you practically covered from head to toe in thick girly spit but still, Lucy refused to let go.



"Hhehehehhe..NOOOO You're just sooo cute....MWAH,MWAH!!" As unable to help herself,she continued until you were finally covered with spit and giggling, she finally pulled away as she used a bit of her dress sleeve to carefully clean you off as she made herself comfortable on the bed to read a book while you rested,exhausted on the dresser.




After a while,Lucy put up the book and turned back to you with another mischievous smile.

"Oh No..Now what?" You thought,still exhausted as she leaned over and picked him up again. "So now what are you going to do to me Lucy?"

As she didn't reply right away but walked over to her dresser and pulled out some surprisingly really small doll-sized clothes. "OHHH Noooo Y-You can't Be Serious..." You choked out as her smile grew wider.


"Once again,I'm going to have a bit of fun with you since all my siblings are busy cleaning the mansion and I have been told to simply stay in my room for the time being..but it's boring just reading books so I decided to do something fun with you."

"Yes it will be really fun for both of us and look,they even look right about your size!" Then she started dressing you like a doll and started showing you off. 1433.content:
You are a twelve year old boy, a student at the comprehensive school called Experiement House.
Yo
This school had an unfavourable reputation and never seemed to perform well academically. This was in many ways the fault of an utterly incompetent headmistress who utterly failed to manage the children who attended the school. As such, many of the children were out of control and bullying was commonplace.

The largest and most troublesome gang of bulleis was simply referred to collectively by the rest of the schoo as 'them', and everybody knew who 'them' were, and tried to avoid them' wherever possible. You, however are one of 'them'.

You really aren't a very pleasant person at all, and none-too-bright either, you were just the right kind of person to join in with a gang of bullies, for you loved to torment people who were better or brighter than you were, and being one of 'them' meant you had your group of like-minded companions to hide behind or call on for support for 'them' would always act as a group, ever alone for numbers gave you strength - or so you thought.

One of your latest victims was a girl called Jill, and she was everything that you and your little band of cronies dispised. She was a bright girl, normally friendly and open but you hadn't failed to notice that through your efforts she had started to become withdrawn, nervous and defensive. This was fine by you though.

You and your band of misfits spotted her again, trying not to draw attention to herself, and clearly failing. You started to tease her and call her names again, and as some of your fellows were nearby, they joined in as well.

Jill ran, you lost track of her for a little while but eventually you saw her together with a boy called Eustace. Of couse you didn't care for him either. He used to be one of your gang, but he left and anyone who leaves' them' is simply marking themselves as the next target.

The two of them were talking toggether, and you were not close enough to pick up the whole conversation but you picked up one word clearly enough... 'Aslan'. Was that a name, it was a silly name, you were sure and you burst out laughing as soon as you heard it. You called to the rest of 'them' who were nearby. This was something else you could mock Pole about, something else you could beat her with.

Jill and Eustance moved off, and you and your group followed after them. You were closest though. The pair moved towards the wall of the school and to a wooden doorway that you knew was alwys locked. They were surely trapped, and you knew it. You would be upon them at any moment.

The door opened though, it never opened. Beyond was a green,fertile land, not the greenhouses or waste ground you would expect to see beyond that door. The moment that Jill and Eustace stepped through the door they seemed to disappear but that was surely a trick. The boy, Eustace closed the door behind him but you had watched them, you knew where they had gone... you thought.

A few moments later you too were at that door. You tried the handle. It opened. Beyond was that same green, fertile land.You passed though the entrance and turned to close the door behind you but you could not feel the handle.

What you didn't know was that the instant you passed through that door, you shrunk down to just six inches in height. You had been a small boy trying to act big, and as you entered that other place, somehow you revealed yourself as just how small you really were. You did not know that this was Aslan's doing, Aslan, who you had laughed at earler had shrunk you the moment you entered his country.

The door was massive, more huge that you could imagine and the handle was way above your head. What on earth?

In the dirstance you could see a cliff edge, and Jill was standing very close to it. She seemed huge. Eustance came forward to try to pull her back from the brink and he fell over the edge. He too looked massive. What was happening here? You look out over the cliff and see clouds below. Below? How high up were you?

A lion, a huge lion bounded towards the edge of the cliff, let out a huge breath and ran back the way he had come.

Jill starts to cry. She was liking Eustance, her was nice to her and now thanks mainly to her own showing off, she had lost him. She did not know that he wa still alive and was falling towards Narnia.

Now that Jil lwas alone, you seemed to forgot how large she appeared and you started teasing her again. Jill looks in your direction, she can here you but she can't seem to see where the voice is coming from.

At that point, recognition dawns on her face. She reaches for you and...

"Oh! Maybe you're one of them fairy folk like the ones who play tricks on travelers! Wait, no, you're not glowey like them." She held you in front of her eyes as she continued to think.
"Well you're too small to be people, you're not glowey enough to be a fairy, and you CLAIM that you're not a bug." That last bit was said with no small amount of skepticism. "Oh maybe you're a special living doll for me to play with!"
You stared at her dumbfounded. "Wh- IM NOT A DOLL!" You quickly shout, though you do little more than make her giggle.

1532212.content:
It happened. Charlotte didn't know how particularly, but it happened. Here she was, a 12 year old girl clad in a t-shirt covered by four horizontally alternating ebony and ivory hues going to an audition for some modeling gig, and she was somehow transformed into a 129 foot tall giantess who was currently stumbling through the streets of… whatever town/city that this story takes place in.

With every step Charlie took, her feet left ten-foot craters that engulfed the heated concrete roads. The sounds of ordinary urban living were tuned out by panicked civilians screaming, running, and honking their horns in fear of the young titaness. She bent over forward to try and calm them down, but this only served to scare the populace even further. Her innocent ears received screams of ‘Monster!’, ‘Freak!’, ‘We’re all gonna die!’, amongst other more profanity-laden slurs directed toward her. Her face reddened in sadness as hot, wet tears cascaded down her facial cheeks and splashed onto the ground below, crushing automobiles and drowning citizens before evaporating in the blazing July heat.

As a matter of fact, not even someone with the advantage of having access to higher and colder altitudes like Charlie was immune to it. Somewhat regretful for wearing the heat-absorbing black on half of her attire, Charlotte wiped gallon-sized beads of sweat from her forehead, inadvertently raining it down on more terrified city-dwellers. The scorching summer temperature of 100 °F was so overwhelming that Charly’s thirst was magnified beyond even what a person of her present stature was capable of possessing. Her tongue was void of saliva, regardless of her attempts to moisten her mouth, and the sweat that was descending her body was beginning to seep through her glorified t-shirt. The smell brought upon by the heavily-stained article of clothing was enough to cause many of the puny humans below to faint. Even Charly had to plug her nose to shield herself from the aroma, but she was soon reminded of her other predicament regarding the need to purge her parched state.

Conveniently, she spotted a 71 foot long semi-truck with the shamelessly advertised brand name of Pepsi slapped on the side. Charlotte’s baby blue irises sparkled with wonder as she easily broke the lock on the back door and gazed at the multitude of beverages being housed inside. She took a moment to check her surroundings, pondering where the people who were supposed to be around this cargo were at this moment.

“Hmm. I must’ve scared them off.” She stated with a dejected expression.

A grumble from her stomach that Charly believed others would mistake for her roaring like a feral beast snapped her out of her depressed trance. She cupped her flat-as-a-board abdominal area with her hands and groaned in pain, rationalizing that the importance of quenching her thirst superseded that of the legal issues that would likely befall her afterwards. Pushing back the agony as much as she could, Charly dislodged the 48 foot long trailer from the 23 foot long truck, so as to have an easier time lifting her drink up to her mouth. Then with a grunt of effort, she heaved the trailer into the air using both of her hands and tipped it down toward her gaping maw. Hundreds upon hundreds of cold, sugary soft drink dropped into the gullet of the adolescent colossus. Once the entirety of the metal husk was vacated of its delectable fizzy nectar, Charlie still took the time to gently set it back on the ground, but was unable to reattach it to the truck. The overgrown girl then proceeded to chew through the plastic that concealed the Pepsi and was rewarded with gallons of caffeinated liquid that flooded her taste buds with a refreshing chilled flavor.

Her cheeks bulged as she slowly swished it around in her mouth, wishing to savor every moment of this experience. After two ½ minutes, she’d decided to finally gulp down her quarry, sending it on a one way trip to her boiling stomach acids. Charly breathed a sigh of relief as her desire for fluid revitalization was at last fulfilled, but then she felt something… off. Deep within the confines of the giantess’s belly, the onyx ocean of carbonated calories was waging a wild war with the domestic green gastric juices, and it just resulted in internal turmoil for the host. Charly once again clutched her tummy in distress, though now that distress manifested from an overfilled gut rather than an empty one. Charlotte could hear popping sounds emanating from her gastrointestinal area, signifying that her battle inside was becoming even more chaotic. She could even see a small paunch forming from her previously thin stomach, yet was unable to identify the cause of it. The only thing that indicated the truth to her was a strange emptiness in the top half of her belly.

Unbeknownst to the aspiring model, that bloating was due to the new atmosphere of sickly gas being born from the mixture of soda and stomach acid. Gargantuan bubbles were blown, expanded, and popped in the blink of an eye, adding even more gas to the swirling maelstrom that was being built up. The grumbling of a upset tummy grew in volume, giving Charlotte an ominous sense of dread, before suddenly going silent. Charly tilted her head to the left slightly and raised her thin, blonde right eyebrow in confusion.

“I wonder why it sto-”

A sharp pain interrupted her statement, forcing her to clench her belly a third time. This was the last warning that she was given by her body before it happened. The storm of putrid gas had swelled to a size that exceeded the dimensions of capacity that her stomach could provide and forced its way out. Before Charly knew what was happening, the mass of gas shot up her throat and erupted with a thunderous boom.

~*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP P!*~

Every window within a 15 mile radius was instantly shattered and the glass that fell from the monumental skyscrapers unfortunately fell onto many of the now deafened denizens. Most of the car alarms in the city rang, though all were drowned out by Charly’s apocalyptic eructation. Said eructation could be heard from any neighboring city and carried with it the stench of quasi-digested soft drink. The odor took on a repulsive brown tint that flew at the speed one would a hurricane to be. People, animals, belongings, and other miscellaneous objects were blown away by winds originating from the prepubescent female, crashing and dying when meeting any stationary structures. The sheer power of the belch ripped through the ground, collapsing a vast array of buildings and creating crevices that consumed any poor soul unable to escape. The belligerent burp bellowed for 20 seconds before bidding the world adieu, and it was unlikely to be missed. Standing at the epicenter of this unnatural disaster was the nigh-130 foot tall giantess, blushing a dark crimson and clasping both hands over her mouth as a new slew of hot tears dripped down her cheeks. Against her best intentions, all of Charly’s actions wrought more havoc and hysteria and after all that had happened, she only had the heart to whisper two words.

“Excuse me.”

Two hours later…

The preteen’s solo exodus brought her to quaint little town (which also has no name for the sake of fairness). Even from a distance, she could tell that it was much smaller than the last one. It was only about ten blocks wide and the population couldn’t have exceeded 2,000 people. When Charlotte crossed the border into the settlement, she noticed something strange (relatively speaking, of course): there was nothing there. The deeper she got into the town, the greater her nervousness became. Though the buildings were intact, the streets were deprived of any citizens, cars, or any other signs that it had once been inhabited. The buildings themselves weren’t even that impressive, the highest of which barely reaching up to Charly’s now empty stomach. With an inhuman view of the entire city, Charlotte was still unable to spot anyone who looked like they might live here, save for one.

Lying down on the ground a couple blocks away was a small person, supposedly unconscious. Fearing the worse, the titaness sprinted toward it, leaving more foot-shaped craters in the roads and stirring up winds strong enough to knock over the abandoned automobiles. The ground shook so violently that the person was jolted out of their sleep. Dazed, the person turned toward the source of the tremors and was shocked by what it was.

“W-Who are you??” The person asked in astonishment.

Charly blushed at the question, and also at the one who asked it. A young boy who looked the same age as her, and was sporting blue jean shorts, a white t-shirt, red tennis shoes with orange toe caps and laces, and gray socks. His neck-length hair and thin eyebrows were dark brown; his irises had a yellow hue. Freckles peppered his tanned skin on his cheeks and forehead. He appeared rather cute to her, even though he looked terrified.

“My name is Charlotte. What’s your name?” She replied.

“David.” He answered. “How are you so tall?”

“I don’t know. I was at a modeling audition and somehow I just turned into a giant.” Charlotte responded, shrugging her shoulders.

“Well, do you know what that thunder was?”

“… Thunder?” She repeated.

“Yeah, there was a loud booming sound that came from the north.” David explained. “It happened around two hours ago. Everyone here was so startled by it that they left. I got left behind in the commotion.”

Charly’s face softened at this, wondering where this was going.

“Does your family know that you’re still here?” She inquired.

“Actually, I’m an orphan.”

The giantess clasped her hands to her mouth. If anything, she could relate to losing a family member.

“I’m so sorry.” She said.

“No, it’s ok-” The boy tried to say.

“You don’t understand! I’m the one who caused that thunder.” Charlotte interrupted. “When I got this big, I got really thirsty and drank a truck full of soda. After that, I burped so loudly that I destroyed the city that I was in!”

“What?”

“I’m the reason that this town is deserted and you’re all alone!” She cried. “I’m a monster!”

Dave had to take a minute to register what he just heard. A 129-foot tall girl walked up to him and told him that she made his entire town leave him. Needless to say, it was a lot to take in.

“Wait, Charlotte. You’re not a monster.” He finally chimed in. “I bet you were just scared of what happened to you. Anyone would if they were in your shoes.”

Charlotte sniffed and stared at him.

“It’s just… I feel awful for what I did. All those people are gone because of me.”

“You only made an accident. Don’t hold it against yourself.” David assured.

Charly was surprised by his kindness and blushed even more because of it. This caused David to blush in return, looking away from the female colossus. Then, he was surprised when she laid a big wet smooch on his face. The prepubescent male looked up at her, and she giggled at his flustered expression.

“Hee hee hee. Thank you, David.” She said with a slight smile. “ But you can call me Charly.”

David smiled in turn, happy that she wasn’t focusing on the past anymore.

“So what do you want to do now?” Dave asked.

Charly brought her left index finger to her chin as she pondered her next move.

“Hmm. Well, I’m still feeling pretty hot, and since you’re the only one here, I suppose I can remove my shirt.” She suggested with a playful grin.

She then proceeded to pull of her black and white shirt, revealing her once more flat stomach and leaving her in only her white panties and bra.

“If you want, there’s a large lake outside out the town that you might be able to fit in.” The boy suggested back, his blush intensifying.

With an excited giggle, Charly picked up her new friend with her left index finger and thumb and waltzed out of the town. In a few minutes, they’d arrived at the lake and Dave hadn’t exaggerated its size: The lake had a perfectly circular shape and a diameter of 250 feet. Charly sat David on the soft green grass and dunked her right foot in the lake. The contrasting cool temperature of the water made her reel back her foot before dipping it back in. Goosebumps started dotting her legs as she sank her left one in the liquid. Charly laid her back on the ground and sighed in relief, having found a way to beat the heat that hopefully wouldn’t destroy another city. As she took the rare opportunity to relax, David decided to walk up to the docile giantess and feel her skin. He placed a hand on her side and was taken aback by how smooth it felt. Clearly, Charly moisturized quite often. The titanic girl faintly felt the boy’s rubbing and giggled again.

“Hey, David, could you maybe give me a belly rub?” She requested. “Your hands feel great.”

The brunette’s eyes widened at her requested, but nodded in agreement and was again picked up by Charly. This time though, he was placed on top of her abdomen. Marveling at the sight before him, David got to work on his impromptu massage as he caressed, kneaded, and scratched his new friend’s tummy. Charlotte laughed even louder at the feeling, enjoying this as much as he was. But then she began moving, and this lead to an odd situation (again relatively speaking). As Charly tossed and turned, David was rolled and tumbled all over her belly, eventually plummeting into the big hole at the center.

David’s fall into Charly’s navel was thankfully not a hard one. He landed on a soft layer of skin, but was wedged inside. He tried to move, but this only made things harder. With every motion he made in there, Charly felt an even greater sensation than before. This lead to her giggling louder and wriggling about even wilder, ironically making his wriggling to escape even more difficult. This left him with only one option left.

"Charly, I'm in your belly button! Please stop moving!" He screamed at the top of his lungs.

But does she hear him?
15322122.title: A New Friend.

choices: For fun David starts tickling Charly's belly
Something else occurs Charly's mother is found alive
153221221.content:
Fortunately for the adolescent male, his titanic companion heard his pleas for help and stopped moving. Lying on her back again, Charly raised her right hand over her belly button and lowered it inside, pulling him out. Then she brought him to her face and grinned naughtily.

“Were you having fun down there?” Charlotte asked.

“Uhhh… no. No! That was awful!” Dave replied hastily, a searing blush covering his face.

“Heh, if you say so.” She scoffed, not buying it.

The giantess placed the flustered boy back on the wet grass before sliding her body into the lake, surprised at it being deep enough to contain her body, and let her frame float in the water as she took her time bathing the smell of sweat off. All the while, David couldn’t help but stare at the titaness scrubbing her armpits and legs, trying to remove the grime that had naturally accumulated on her. Charlotte caught on to this and decided to have a little fun with her audience.

First, she reared her pretty head out of the water’s surface and shook it from left to right, whipping drops of water from her hair that soaked Dave. Then, Charly brought the upper half of her body above the waves and placed her hands on her hips, her legs slowly kicking to keep herself afloat. Following that, she rotated her body 45° to the left, making her right side look more prominent, and gave the boy a playful wink. Next, Charlotte raised her hands up to the back of her neck, making her elbows bend up over her head, and shifted her body another 45°. Now her entire left side was hidden from view. Finally, Charlotte swam to the shore and planted her elbows into the dirt, resting her soft head on her closed hands. During this, she flashed a cheeky grin at David, making him sweat profusely.

“So, how did you like that?”

“I-It wuuhh.. was, uh.. fine, I guess…” He scrambled for a reply, scratching the back of his head.

Charly cranked her head to the left a little bit as she exited the lake.

“I see. That was only ‘fine’.” She mused.

Thinking that he made a mistake, Dave tried to correct himself, but only succeeded in stumbling over his own words. Once again, Charlotte snickered at his dorky antics, but then felt emptiness inside of her.

“Uhh… I think I’m getting hungry again.” She stated.

“Well, we could go back to my town and see if there’s any food.”

“Sounds good.” The white clad girl agreed.

Gathering her friend and putting her shirt back on, the colossal child walked back towards the boy’s hometown. Once there, Charly let David down near his orphanage while she approached a dollar store. Before she could eat though, she heard a faint sound out in the distance. Charlotte moved her head in the direction of the commotion, and was shocked at what she saw: A military unit.

Meanwhile, David himself was riding his purple bicycle that was conveniently able to seat two people. He’d also heard about the eminent arrival of the army on the radio and was prepared to flee the town with three grocery bags full of supplies. He was about to warn Charly of what happened, but was surprised to see her running toward him.

“David! The military is- Ugh!” Charly tried to warn, but was cut off by a sharp pain in her abdomen.

“Charly! What’s wrong?” Dave asked, concerned.

The giantess once again clutched her tummy in pain as she felt a sensation similar to when she first became a giantess… but also like the opposite. From her perspective, everything around her was steadily get larger, a direct contrast to what happened at the start of this whole incident. Dave’s jaw dropped as he watched Charlotte shrink before his eyes. After 30 seconds, Charly had returned to her original size.

“Charly, what happened? Why’d you shrink?”

“I-I don’t know.” She responded, feeling exhausted from what she went through.

“Well, whatever happened, we need to leave now!” Dave stated.

Charlotte nodded in agreement and the two fled the now empty town, caring not about where they went, but about getting away from the lurking military presence. By the time the army had arrived, the duo were already in the next city. Charly and David slowed down a bit, thinking that they could afford to take it easy for a bit. However, Charly’s eye caught a newsstand with the headline, “City Destroyed! Natural Disaster of Unknown Origin Leaves Thousands Dead!” dominating the top half of the newspapers’ front page. Charly felt sick to her stomach just by reading that title. At her behest, David purchased one of them and was appalled when they got to the obituary.

“No.. no. No! NO!” Charly yelled after reading that her mother was counted amongst the deceased, causing. Dave to clasp his right hand over her mouth.

“Charly, please be quiet. We have to try and lay low for a while, just until we can get somewhere safe.”

“Well, there’s a wide open stretch of land further south. We could try going there.” Charlotte suggested, failing to fight back tears of anguish.

“Alright, we’ll take the city buses as far south as they’ll go.” David planned. “Then, we ride on the tandem bicycle for the rest of the trip.”

“I’ll need a disguise or something until then.” Charly stated, donning a pair of sunglasses and a pink bandana.

The children hopped on a bus, their bicycle being held on a rack at the front. The bus travelled down to the edge of the city before letting our protagonists off. The pair rode across the next city, having some close encounters with some militia who were investigating anything related to the disaster. By the skin of their teeth, they’d made it to another bus and sat quietly while it took them to edge of the next city. They kept to themselves, not talking or responding to anyone who might recognize Charlotte. Their hairs stood on end when a toddler began tugging on Charly’s bandana, but his mother put a stop to it and apologized. Situations similar to these occurred many times on their journey, but by the slimmest of margins, they’d avoided detection. By the time the kids finally left the urban scene, David had used up all of his money as Charly was broke. Then, they were faced with the long bike ride away from their troubles and their old lives.

Three hours later…

The biking exodus was physically taxing on the adolescents. Their food was exhausted and their feet were killing them. However, now that they were alone, they told each other about their own lives. Like how Charly’s father died in a car crash when she was six, so now she was an orphan too, and how David lost his folks to a serial killer with knife. Eventually, they came across a small wooden cabin in the flat wilderness. The bike was parked at the doorstep and the two made their way inside, though they were surprised that it was unlocked. David sat the remains of their supplies, but was caught off guard when he received a gripping hug from his acquaintance.

“What was that for?”

“That was for everything you’ve done to help me.” Charlotte giggled before planting a long kiss on his cheeks.

David was even more surprised by this, and he couldn’t take it anymore. He had to let her know!

“Charly, I want to say that… that I love you.” David’s whole face lit up in a scarlet blush. “You’re the kindest, cutest girl that I’ve ever met, and I’m lucky that I’ve met you.”

Charly’s facial colors soon matched his own, and then exceeded them when he motioned to kiss her back, but now on the lips. Charly was surprised by this, but soon returned the gesture. They spent the next few holding each other in a loving embrace eventually Charly was placed in the same orphanage as David and they continued their relationship – the one good thing to come out of all of this.

It has been eight long years since the incident about a toddler named Adam Szalinski grow into a giant, and roaming through Las Vegas. All was restored though, and was able to spend a lot of time with his family, now that the machine remains untouched ever since.

Right now, the machine is left in the basement, still sitting here without being moved eight years long. That’s when Adam, now ten years of age, comes into the basement, carrying the laundry he was asked to. He doesn’t seem to be happy doing this favour, as a sigh he let out says it all.

“How come I get to do all of this stuff, while the others are playing outside? I wish there’s something I could do.” Adam stressed about house work, which was now his taste by any means.

He had to look around the basement, whilst he was almost done with the washing, that is until he spotted a size machine, which he’s never it for a while, since he and his mother restore themselves back to normal size. He would take a closer look at it, and gives it a pat to see it was still in good condition.

“Whoa! I never thought it could still be here. I thought my Dad took it away after that.” Adam was much confused, but surprised with a smiling expression, since it’s been a good number of years, despite he was only a toddler from that incident.

That’s when he could only wonder if this stuff really works? He would surely wanted to test it out and see if it grows or the other? But the question is, does he wanna ask his Dad, Wayne to give it a test, or would he be able to do it all by himself? Adam would shrugged it out, and decides to...
15413322.title: Adam as a ten year old

choices: Run away given the damage he caused
154133221.content:
“How hard can it be to start this?” Adam scoffed.

He walked around the machine and began flipping switches. The machine hummed to life. A whirring sound began and the pitch shifted higher and higher until Adam had to cover his ears. With a loud boom a burst of energy left the barrel passing through the basement window.

The machine burst into flames. Adam in a panic began batting the machine with a towel until the flames went out. It was clear that the machine was out of commission for an extended period of time. It was not clear if it would ever run again.

Turning his head to the wall, Adam covered his mouth. “Oh crap.” A huge circular feature was present extending through the wall. Studying the edges of the wall, Adam noticed the damaged building materials looked weird. On the floor was a pile of tiny bricks and at the edge of the hole the bricks had a trapezoidal shape.

Looking out the window towards the street, Andy notice the fence beyond was also distorted. Crawling through the wall, Adam walked towards the street. On the ground, Andy found a tiny Tesla car. Kneeling down and looking through the window, it was clear that this was not a toy, but a vehicle which was reduced in size.

Picking up the car, he tucked it behind the fence. He then returned walking the path of the blast. Along the path Adam found reduced bushes and tree. At one point he even thought he saw a tiny cat, but it fled before Adam could catch it.

Returning his eyes to the path, his heart dropped. He saw that the blast struck the community pool. Running over, he hopped the fence. The pool structure itself was fine, so he sighed feeling relieved no one was struck by the blast.

As he turned to leave, out of the corner of his eye he saw some motion. Cornering the creature, he knelt down. To his dismay he saw two woman shaking and holding one another. The two women looked like mother and daughter. The daughter was college aged and her mother was in her mid-40s. Both women looked amazing.

“Come here ladies, I am so sorry for what has happened to you. My father’s shrinking machine exploded.”

“Get away you horrible giant, leave us be,” screamed the younger woman.

“No, no, you have to come with me.” Adam reached in and wrapped his hand around the waist of the older woman. She was wearing a two-piece so he could feel her skin very well. She was warm and soft, but just beneath that softness clearly muscle. She was very fit. The middle age woman began screaming.

The daughter clutched onto the mother, “Leave her alone you monster!” She was crying buckets and punching Adam’s hand. He repressed the desire to laugh at the scene. She was clearly doing nothing to him.

With his free hand, he extended a middle finger and petted the young woman’s head. She shrieked and turned around. “Why are you torturing us?”

“Pretty woman, please let me help you.” He gently touched her head again. Pulling his finger forward, he wiped a tear from her cheek. “Let me take you home so I can try and figure out how to make you big again.”

She started to back away. “Little woman, I am not going to leave you out here to get eaten or taken by someone else. However, I am going to give you a moment. Here is your mother back. She is safe, I just want to help you both.” Adam released the mom, who ran over and cradled her adult daughter.

Adam turned around and found the women’s bag. He noticed on the next chair over was another woman asleep. While the women below the chair were about a foot tall, this sleeping woman was about six inches tall. She clearly was closer to the center of the blast, but hadn’t noticed yet. He quickly snatched up that woman and tucked her into his pocket.

Returning to the mother and daughter, he placed the bag down in front of them. “Please climb in. I won’t touch you, but you need to come with me to be safe.”

The mother escorted the daughter up the flap of the bag. They slide down and slump down into a towel. The mother gives Adam a thumbs up. He reached in and petted her hair. She gave him a weak smile as he zipped up the bag.
154133221.title: ...flip lots of switches

choices: 50 Feet,Really impressive he's about to go through the roof!
100 Feet,The house is in ruins and he towers over the neighborhood.
154133222.content:
While ten year old Adam Szalinski was a all popular student and made the usual good grades(having a total crack pot yet father with a IQ of 189 was always a good thing as he almost never had any trouble with home work) Adam was also thought as a dork and dweeb by the more popular kids of his school who all knew his dad was looney,building those bizarre things in his lab and everyone of course knew the time Adam became a actual giant rampaging through Las Vegas like Godzilla and that only made the kids dislike him even more.

" Watch out guys here comes the BIG BABY!" Taunted Troy,one of the most popular kids of the school and a bit of a bully whenever Adam appeared in the hallways.

"Look out or he might step on your houses Ha,ha,ha!"

"Cut it out Troy," Adam said turning bright red as other kids snickered and pointed at him. "I already told you a bunch of times that happened a long time ago! And besides I barely remember it!"

"Yeah? Well you're still a dweeb and a loser Szalinski! Come on guys we're too cool for the son of the Nutty Professor,let's go play baseball!"

"Hey wait can I come?" Adam asked eagerly

"What are you kidding? Of course not! Go back and help your dad invent the toaster! Loser!!" Troy laughed as he and the other kids trailed off leaving the ten year old behind slightly steamed and hurt.

"It's not fair! So what if my dad's a total nut case who likes inventing things? He's made a lot of cool things over the years!" Adam tried telling himself struggling not to cry as he walked on home "Those other kids are just jealous cause none of their dads are that smart! If I had my way I'd show them all!" As he walked into his house.

End flashback

As Adam was standing in front of the exact machine that a bunch of years back transformed him into a nearly 100 Foot giant toddler since his dad made a few minor adjustments,it would probably be easier to manage. As he started randomly pressing buttons.

"Aww come on dad,couldn't you at least have left a simple instruction booklet informing me how to work this thing-of-bob? Ah-ha bingo! There it is!" He spotted the huge red button at the center and pressed it in for a while nothing happened and disappointed Adam was set to head back upstairs when there was a low rumbling sound that got louder and louder(luckily Adam was home alone with both of his parents at work so there was very little chance of him getting into trouble or someone hearing the commotion) as he realized...

"I-it's working cool! Now wait what did I do before all those years ago? Oh yeah stand in front of it!" As he ran over to where the big gun thingy was and....KA-BOOOOOOOOOMMM!! The sound and fascinating light show sent various types of energy into his body,Adam immediately felt faint,his knees all wobbly and his head dizzy yet he stood firm and managed to grunt his teeth through the pain this lasted for a few minutes or close to a hour until it finally ended.

"It's over! Huh? It's over? A-am I bigger yet?" He wondered as the smoke cleared and he slowly got to his feet looking at the now totaled machine in ruins.

"Awwwww Nooo... Dad's totally going to kill me when he sees this! But...but I'm bigger! I Am Bigger,Really BIG!" He grinned as he looked down at himself,his clothes were definitely tighter and his sneakers were close to tearing but he couldn't care less all that mattered was that he was finally HUGE like before but just how big was he?
154133222.title: ...start the machine on his own.

1541332223.content:
It feel likes it’s happening all over again, so much that a now ten year old Adam Szalinki is a giant once more, standing at the night of 100 feet tall! His smile says it all as it was the exact height he was back when he was a toddler, and it was the chance to prove his worth. He looked down to see his house was in ruins, courtesy of the growth machine that caused him in some way, and looked a bit of a apologetic at first.

“Oops! I’m gonna be in big trouble for this when my parent’s dream this. But on the other hand, I’m finally big again, and I cannot wait to make the impression, especially to Troy when I can see him, face to face!”

Adam grinned so much, that it was on his mind that he wanted to not only surprised Troy, but to also try and ness with a bully, being 100 feet tall is better than being small in reality form. His clothes remained in tact, though a bit tight, but it didn’t matter for Adam as he had to figure things out where to head over first.

His choices are should he had head to Las Vegas like he did before, or would he either head to the park, or go to the Troy’s house so he he could try and teach a bully a lesson? It Adam some thoughts with it, and so he would smirked and decides to head to where?
1541332223.title: Adam is 100 Feet Tall Once Again!

choices: Adam Decides To Take Off His Clothes
15413322231.content:
The 100 foot tall ten year old giant decided to pay his bullies a visit. If they wanted to see a "big baby" they're gonna see it. However as Adam walked down the freeway of the Mojave desert he has a strange case of deja vu. He doesn't remember growing to giant size when he was two years old but walking down the same road gives him a gut feeling. Before Adam realized where he was walking too, following that familiar feeling he had found himself in downtown Las Vegas.

"WOW. I REMEMBER THIS PLACE." The giant ginger says as he walks towards the brightly lit city as the sun sets in the distance. This felt great to Adam, after being blown up by his dad, he has had recurring dreams just like this. Being big in Las Vegas with millions of people cheering him on and praising him. The people on the ground feel the earth shake as something large approaches from the distance.

"Giant Boy!" One person shouts out. "Look out." Others either stared in awe, run in panic, or quickly pulled out their cameras to take pictures. The titanic ten year old looked down at all of the tiny people running around him like little ants. The feeling of power over them and the attention he was getting was intoxicating. Adam didn't even care about the destruction he left behind, his red sneakers leaving cracks in the pavement with his heavy foot steps. He was too busy looking at the bright lights from the casinos like New York New York, MGM Grand, Excalibur and others.

"MAN, I'M PARCHED." The freckled kid says as he wipes away the sweat off of his brow, huge droplets of the salty liquid rains down and splatters on the sidewalk. Adam looks and sees a concert going on. He walks over to it, crushing cars under his feet without even feeling the slightest discomfort. Off to the entrance was a big Pepsi truck. The enormous preteen reaches down and picks up the blue, red and white trailer, peeling the back open like a can and chugs the content. It was like watching a Pepsi commercial. The citizens of Las Vegas watch as his throat expands as gallons of soda goes down his gullet, sounding like loud thunder with each gulp. He finishes draining the entire truck's trailer, crushing it in his hand like a can and letting it drop to the ground in the empty parking lot. A loud rumble was heard coming from his stomach.

BBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!

An enormous belch is let out by the 100 foot tall Adam. Hot winds erupt from his mouth, blowing back trash, the hair on people's heads, and the leaves off of the nearby palm trees. The people nearby cowered as they screamed fearfully and held tightly onto each other as the tornado like winds threaten to blow them away and several windows literally exploded as shattered pieces of glass fell to the ground and the ground itself slightly shook!

BBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!

After a minute, the giant finishes his monstrous burp looking a bit embarrassed as he at first,slapped a huge hand over his mouth staring around nervously. As all the people left standing, soon felt noxious from the horrible smelling fumes. "OOPS. EXCUSE ME!" The giant ginger giggles as he stands proud behind the biggest burp he ever let out.
