15413332221.content:
It was a beautiful day outside. The birds were chirping, kids were laughing and playing. There wasn't even a single cloud in the nice blue sky. Everything was peaceful and quiet. However, nothing can truly stay that way. Some people started to hear complaining. Most just shrugged and continued on with their day. However, the complaints started to get louder, and the ground started to shake. Everyone looked towards where the noise was coming from. They waited patiently as the noise grew very loud. Suddenly, Veruca Salt appeared from behind some buildings.

Most people remembered her from Willy Wonka's contest. The giantess was wearing the same red dress as she wore to the factory. Veruca was barefoot and was only wearing panties and bra under her dress (no other pants). The angry girl stomped through the city and kicked a car so hard, it shot up to space. The next driver wasn't lucky either. Veruca stomped her foot down as hard as she could on a blue sedan, making the driver flat as a pancake.
"I want to have fun! I want it NOW!" She yelled. She picked up two males and lifted up her dress, dropping them in her panties. "Squirm pests! Squirm squirm SQUIRM! As for all of you!" She said looking at the other citizens. "Bring me food! NOW! If I don't get what I want, I'll eat you instead!" She said with a serious look. Her stomach growled, as if to show just how hungry she was. Veruca lied down in the middle of the street.

One woman brought her juicy vegetables. She hoped Veruca would be pleased. However, her hopes quickly faded. Veruca gave a sour frown.
"I don't want vegetables, I want tasty food! I want candy and chocolate! Don't try to trick me!" Veruca yelled. Veruca grabbed the woman and threw the poor girl right in her mouth, swallowing her whole. Unfortunatly the girl tasted very good. If she couldn't get more food, she may have to snack on other humans. She slammed her fist down. "Get moving! As for the three of you!" She said, pointing to three women. "I'm tired of walking around. Rub my feet NOW! Unless you want to be squished under them!" The girls quickly ran over to her feet and started to rub. Veruca gave an evil smile. She was glad that she took that formula from Wonka. The citizens returned with lots of chocolate. They climbed up her body and threw it in. She loved the taste of everything she was eating. One boy tripped and fell on Veruca's tongue. However, even though Veruca could feel this teenager, she made no effort to help him. She simply closed her mouth and gulped him down.

Veruca's three foot slaves were trying their best to please their new queen. However, Veruca couldn't feel any of them because of the size of their hands.
"Why don't you listen! I told you to rub my feet! What are you doing, playing go fish? Let me get them closer to you, PATHETIC BUGS!" She pushed her feet down on top of them. Their bones were slowly crushed and broken. The women shrieked as they were dying by Veruca's smelly foot. The giantess rubbed her foot on them until their bodies popped.

Veruca kept eating chocolate until she felt ready for her deadly attack as she felt her stomach grumbling louder than ever.
"CITIZENS, BEHOLD MY POWER!" She yelled. She sat up and burped as loud as she could. "BUUUUUUURRRRRRRPPPPP!" Many humans were blown back by it, some even passed out. Veruca could hear windows shattering. She even heard some sirens going off. She laughed, "Oops excuse me!" She smirked pretending to gasp out-loud and cover her mouth pleased with her destruction.

To celebrate her victory, she reached in her panties and started to rub herself. She could feel the men in there and decided to 'help'. She made sure to be rough. She moaned as more food was brought. She ate her food and press harder. In doing so, she crushed one of them. She rubbed faster and faster, until cum landed on the other male. She pulled him out and smiled. He was terrified of her and Veruca wanting even more fun-time from her 'toys' began stroking his stomach he squirmed and laughed begging her to stop "I WANT TO HEAR YOU LAUGH,I WANT IT NOW!!" She ordered as she stroked his stomach faster Veruca ignored his pleas and begging as she kept tickling him until she got bored and surprisingly gently put him down however she still had no mercy or guilt and looked around and saw a bag of chocolate that someone brought. She grabbed it and threw both the wet man and the chocolate in her mouth. She mashed them both up and swallowed. Though she wanted to eat more food, she came up with a evil plan.

154133322212.content:
Veruca stomped to the edge of the city, crushing more cars in the process. She got into a frog-like position and aimed her butt towards the city. Her fart was so big, almost every building went down and a lot of people fainted. Veruca gave a cruel laugh as she got back up. She turned around only to be disappointed. One of the buildings had survived.

It was a sky scraper that was taller than her. Both the fact that it was still standing and that it was taller than her beautiful body made her upset. She went over to it and looked inside. She saw something that upset her more. Everyone looked completely unaware of what was going on. It wasn't until someone saw her outside that people started to freak out. She punched through the thin glass and grabbed a random person. Her prisoner was a blond female wearing a black suit.

"This is unfair! I should be taller than that building! I want to be the tallest thing in this city! Take this tower down NOW," she yelled. Her victim was really scared. She looked down to see that she had no way of escaping. It didn't help that she was afraid of heights.

"O . . Okay. You just need to give us a couple of days. I'm sure that-" she started, however Veruca got really upset.

"A couple of days!? I won't wait that long! I'll just knock it down myself!" Veruca chucked the woman behind her and cracked her knuckles. She backed up so she had room. The giantess started to run and slammed into the building. It shook like there was a natural earthquake. The tower fell to its side. Veruca laughed, but didn't feel like a victor yet. She thought of the many ways she could finish the job. Veruca could step on the skyscraper. She could sit on it. She could even hit it with her hands. However, she thought of the best way to deal with this. She grabbed the end and broke it off so it was short enough to pull it up. Veruca grabbed the main part and lifted it up over her head. Her hands started to bend it. Glass shattered and bodies started to fall. She opened her mouth, welcoming the people to her stomach. Once she felt she got enough people, she tossed the building far away. It landed with a large thud, hitting people before it stopped. Veruca wanted to have more fun though, so she . . .
